detail_desc: Jumpsuit in velour with a V-neck front and back, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wrapover front with a concealed button. Elasticated seam and tie belt at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Large metal earrings with faceted plastic beads and sparkly stones. Length approx. 10 cm.
Fully lined one-shoulder swimsuit with a decorative knot detail and cut-out section on the shoulder strap and a cut-out section at the waist.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative buttons. Quilted sections at the sides and cuffs, and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative buttons. Quilted sections at the sides and cuffs, and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Polo-neck tops in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Polo-neck tops in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.

Single-breasted jacket in a woven wool blend with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette. For the matching trousers, look for: 0700375.

Checked suit trousers in soft wool with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Shorts in a striped cotton weave with an extended waistband with a button, an adjustable tab and button at the sides and a zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim legs with creases. Slim Fit.

Single-breasted jacket in a striped cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Trousers in woven fabric made from a wool blend with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with sewn-in creases.
Hoop earrings in metal with an embossed pattern.
Long, fine-knit cardigan in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Long, fine-knit cardigan in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Long, fine-knit cardigan in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Sleeveless, A-line dress in mesh embroidered with sequins. Opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, 3/4-length sleeves and a drawstring at the front. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, 3/4-length sleeves and a drawstring at the front. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Knee-length nursing dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a tie belt. Practical inner top for easier nursing access. Unlined.

Knee-length nursing dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a tie belt. Practical inner top for easier nursing access. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed jersey with a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed jersey with a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed jersey with a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed jersey with a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed jersey with a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Wide top in soft viscose jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Wide top in soft viscose jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Wide top in soft viscose jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Wide top in soft viscose jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Wide top in soft viscose jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy patterned weave with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in the side and a laser-cut hem. Unlined.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy patterned weave with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in the side and a laser-cut hem. Unlined.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy patterned weave with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in the side and a laser-cut hem. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a fringe-trimmed wrapover front and fringed hem. Inner skirt.
Long-sleeved nursing top in jersey crêpe with a wrapover front and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved nursing top in jersey crêpe with a wrapover front and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Practical inner top for easier nursing access.

High-waisted paper bag trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly and concealed button, and a detachable fabric belt with a covered metal buckle. Pockets in the side seams, fake welt back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.

High-waisted paper bag trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly and concealed button, and a detachable fabric belt with a covered metal buckle. Pockets in the side seams, fake welt back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.
Nursing dress in a supersoft fine knit with a gentle wrapover V-neck and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Nursing dress in a supersoft fine knit with a gentle wrapover V-neck and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Nursing dress in a supersoft fine knit with a gentle wrapover V-neck and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Nursing dress in a supersoft fine knit with a gentle wrapover V-neck and practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps, a V-neck with buttons at the top and pleats on the chest. Seam at the waist with a tie detail, pleats and gathers at the front, gathers at the back, pockets in the side seams and long, wide legs.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps, a V-neck with buttons at the top and pleats on the chest. Seam at the waist with a tie detail, pleats and gathers at the front, gathers at the back, pockets in the side seams and long, wide legs.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Pleated skirt in satin with diagonal seams at the top. Concealed zip with a hook-and-eye fastener in the side seam, and a laser-cut hem.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with light, removable pads in the cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an opening with lacing at the back.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with light, removable pads in the cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an opening with lacing at the back.
Trousers in twill made from a wool blend with a regular waist, pleats at the top, concealed zip in one side and side pockets. Wide, gently tapered legs with creases.
Shirt jacket in soft, supple suede with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, yoke with fringing, pockets in the side seams and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Knee-length jacket in a wool blend containing some silk with tuxedo-style lapels in satin and a concealed press-stud fastening at the front. Long sleeves with a pleat at the cuffs. Lined.

Trousers woven in a wool blend with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Pockets in the side seams, a welt back pocket and straight, wide legs with creases and visible seams at the back.
High-waisted trousers in a sturdy viscose and linen blend with a sheen. Zip fly and hook-and-eye fastening, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs with creases.

Sleeveless top woven in a viscose and linen blend with a slight sheen. Elastication around the neckline and armholes, a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back, and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Longer shirt in softly draping silk with a small, raw-edge stand-up collar and bib front with pin-tucks. Concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in softly draping silk with a stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back and long sleeves. Wide cuffs with concealed buttons, and slits in the sides.
Top in softly draping silk with a stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back and long sleeves. Wide cuffs with concealed buttons, and slits in the sides.
Top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend in a narrow cut at the top with a racer back.
Trousers in a jacquard-weave moire silk blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, a welt back pocket and straight, wide legs.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a sheen. V-neck at the back, short cap sleeves and a pleat at the front to emphasise the waist.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a textured viscose weave with padded shoulders. Decorative, gathered seam and a slit at the front, and a long, concealed zip at the back with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Lined.

Short dress in velvet made from a silk blend with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Padded shoulders, long sleeves and wide satin cuffs with a slit and button. Lined.

Jumper knitted in a soft cashmere blend with decorative seams at the back, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. V-neck at the front, a smaller V-neck at the back, wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.

Trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.

Trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Pile jacket with a collar that can be made into a high stand-up collar with a button, buttons down the front and open, diagonal side pockets. Imitation leather details and lining.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button and press-studs at the crotch.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button and press-studs at the crotch.

Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather and imitation suede with a metal chain and imitation leather shoulder strap. Flap with a decorative metal ring and magnetic fastener, and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5x17x21 cm.

Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather and imitation suede with a metal chain and imitation leather shoulder strap. Flap with a decorative metal ring and magnetic fastener, and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5x17x21 cm.

Shoulder bag in sturdy imitation leather with a suede flap, metal fastener and adjustable metal chain shoulder strap. One large outer compartment at the front and one inner compartment. Fabric lining. Size 4.5x16.5x22 cm.

Shoulder bag in sturdy imitation leather with a suede flap, metal fastener and adjustable metal chain shoulder strap. One large outer compartment at the front and one inner compartment. Fabric lining. Size 4.5x16.5x22 cm.
